content.raw:
We have implemented this progress bar alongside with our own one. It works, but there is the following error coming up:

`2018-10-22 17:04:51,257 INFO BLACS: instantiating plugins`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,278 INFO BLACS: creating plugin tabs`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,278 INFO BLACS: reordering tabs`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,278 INFO BLACS: starting analysis submission thread`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,298 INFO BLACS: starting queue manager thread`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,298 INFO BLACS: setting up notification system`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,298 INFO BLACS.queue_manager.thread: starting`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,358 INFO BLACS: setting up preferences system`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,378 ERROR BLACS: Error in plugin_setup_complete() for plugin`  
`'progress_bar'. Trying again with old call signature...`  
`Traceback (most recent call last):`  
`File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs_main_.py", line 459, in init`  
`plugin.plugin_setup_complete(blacs_data)`  
`File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs\plugins\progress_bar_init_.py", line 120, in`  
`plugin_setup_complete`  
`props = properties.get(f, acq_device, 'connection_table_properties')`  
`File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_utils\properties.py", line 124, in get`  
`return get_con_table_properties(h5_file, device_name)`  
`File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_utils\properties.py", line 97, in get_con`  
`table_properties`  
`row = dataset[dataset['name'] == device_name][0]`  
`IndexError: index 0 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 0`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,378 ERROR BLACS: Plugin 'progress_bar' error. Plugin may not`  
`be functional.`  
`Traceback (most recent call last):`  
`File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs_main.py", line 464, in init`  
`plugin.plugin_setup_complete()`  
`TypeError: plugin_setup_complete() takes exactly 2 arguments (1 given)`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,417 INFO BLACS: showing UI`  
`2018-10-22 17:04:51,447 INFO BLACS: BLACS instantiated`

Any ideas?

By the way, labscript 2.2.0 is already implemented and shows no problems when running some standard experiment scripts.

We have implemented this progress bar alongside with our own one. It works, but there is the following error coming up:

2018-10-22 17:04:51,257 INFO BLACS: instantiating plugins
2018-10-22 17:04:51,278 INFO BLACS: creating plugin tabs
2018-10-22 17:04:51,278 INFO BLACS: reordering tabs

2018-10-22 17:04:51,298 INFO BLACS: setting up notification system
2018-10-22 17:04:51,298 INFO BLACS.queue_manager.thread: starting
2018-10-22 17:04:51,358 INFO BLACS: setting up preferences system
2018-10-22 17:04:51,378 ERROR BLACS: Error in plugin_setup_complete() for plugin
'progress_bar'. Trying again with old call signature...
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs_main_.py", line 459, in init
plugin.plugin_setup_complete(blacs_data)
File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs\plugins\progress_bar_init_.py", line 120, in
plugin_setup_complete
props = properties.get(f, acq_device, 'connection_table_properties')
File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_utils\properties.py", line 124, in get
return get_con_table_properties(h5_file, device_name)
File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_utils\properties.py", line 97, in get_con
table_properties
row = dataset[dataset['name'] == device_name][0]
IndexError: index 0 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 0
2018-10-22 17:04:51,378 ERROR BLACS: Plugin 'progress_bar' error. Plugin may not
be functional.
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "E:\labscript_suite\blacs_main.py", line 464, in init
plugin.plugin_setup_complete()
TypeError: plugin_setup_complete() takes exactly 2 arguments (1 given)
2018-10-22 17:04:51,417 INFO BLACS: showing UI
2018-10-22 17:04:51,447 INFO BLACS: BLACS instantiated

Any ideas?

By the way, labscript 2.2.0 is already implemented and shows no problems when running some standard experiment scripts.
